revised_title: Improvements to the Expansion Apparatus for Visualizing Ionizing Particle Tracks in Gases and New Findings
tldr: The author describes improvements to the expansion apparatus for making ionizing particle tracks visible in gases, including a larger cloud chamber, a more efficient electric field, and a mercury-vapour spark-gap for illumination. The author also presents new findings, including the ability to photograph the tracks of even the fastest beta particles and the individual ions in X-ray tracks.
